Name: Tarkov Russian Calibers (FIXED!)
Description:
Did you ever feel that brass is a disgusting material?
Do you think that Russian steel casings are superior? 
Well I have the mod for you!

This mod replaces majority of the Russian calibers with new and improved textures, based off from "Escape from Tarkov"

Ammo replaced in this mod:
-  5.45x39
-  7.62x38
-  9x18
-  23x74 (Special Thanks to Turtle for this texture)
-  7.62x54R
-  7.62x25TT

Special Thanks to:

Meat_banano (Assisted with Mesh extraction)
Potatoes (Dealt with my problems)
PretendTurtle11 (Created the original, as well as helped me with Substance)
Tarkov Developers (For giving me Inspiration)
Anton (For making H3VR)
